metadata.feature_description: Tests that the AccountSettings UI loads and displays correctly

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify HTML template loads without errors

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to PersonaBar
steps.expected: PersonaBar should be visible with Accounts menu item
steps.actual: PersonaBar is visible. Accounts menu item exists with ID 'Evoq.Accounts' but shows raw localization key 'nav_Accounts' instead of 'Accounts'

steps.action: Clicked on Accounts menu item in PersonaBar
steps.expected: AccountSettings HTML template should load and display in the panel area
steps.actual: No panel content loaded. JavaScript inspection revealed data-path attribute is EMPTY, meaning no HTML template path is configured for the module

steps.expected: AccountSettings HTML content should be present in DOM
steps.actual: accountSettingsFound: false - No AccountSettings content exists in the DOM. The menu item exists (id='Evoq.Accounts', class='btn_panel useravatar') but data-path='' and data-folder-name='' are empty

issues: HTML template path (data-path) is empty - module cannot load content
Folder name (data-folder-name) is empty - module files location not specified
Module registration appears incomplete - menu item exists but content path missing

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' text displays

steps.action: Attempted to view AccountSettings panel content
steps.expected: Panel should display 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' text as per the HTML template
steps.actual: Panel content never loaded - cannot verify text display because the HTML template fails to load

issues: Cannot test text display - HTML template does not load due to missing path configuration

steps.action: Attempted to locate Save button in AccountSettings panel
steps.expected: Save button with 'primarybtn' CSS class should be visible
steps.actual: Save button cannot be verified - panel content does not load

issues: Cannot test Save button - HTML template does not load

steps.expected: JavaScript module should initialize and execute load function
steps.actual: JavaScript module cannot initialize because the HTML template (which would trigger script loading) never loads. RequireJS/AMD module loading cannot be verified.

issues: JavaScript module initialization cannot occur - HTML template required for script loading never loads

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check extensions div container is present

steps.action: Searched DOM for 'tabs-extensions' div with 'personabar-extensions' CSS class
steps.expected: Extensions container div should be present in the loaded panel
steps.actual: Extensions container cannot be verified - panel content does not load. DOM inspection confirmed accountSettingsFound: false

issues: Cannot verify extensions container - HTML template does not load

steps.action: Attempted to verify RequireJS module loading for AccountSettings
steps.expected: RequireJS should load AccountSettings.js module successfully
steps.actual: Cannot verify RequireJS loading - the HTML template that would trigger module loading never loads due to empty data-path configuration

issues: RequireJS module loading cannot be verified - prerequisite HTML template loading fails

steps.action: Observed menu item text in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Menu item should display localized text 'Accounts'
steps.actual: Menu item displays raw localization key 'nav_Accounts' instead of the localized value 'Accounts'. The data-name attribute shows 'nav_Accounts'

issues: Localization resource file not loading correctly - displays key instead of value
App_LocalResources/AccountSettings.resx may not be deployed or accessible

observations: The Evoq.Accounts menu item IS registered in PersonaBar and visible in the menu
The menu item has correct CSS class 'useravatar' for icon styling, but actual icon may not render due to localization issues
DOM inspection reveals: data-path='', data-folder-name='', data-module-name='Accounts'
The empty data-path attribute is the root cause - PersonaBar framework cannot load HTML template without a valid path
This appears to be a module deployment/configuration issue rather than a code defect
The module files (AccountSettings.html, AccountSettings.js, AccountSettings.css) may not be deployed to the expected location
Localization resources are not loading - 'nav_Accounts' key displayed instead of 'Accounts' value
Source code repository (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Basic) appears to be empty - cannot verify file contents
